imdb.title: Kamigami no asobi
imdb.plot: Yui must teach detached gods to understand human emotions before the school year is over,or Yui and the gods will be stuck in school forever.

episodes.title: The Forbidden Academy
episodes.plot: Yui Kusanagi is your typical average High School girl who loves swords and who has parents that own a shrine.

episodes.title: Beautiful Shackles
episodes.plot: The episode starts off with Yui meeting Apollo, one of the gods she is supposed to teach.

episodes.title: Sea Breeze Conflict
episodes.plot: The episode begins with Thoth teaching in class. Dionysus caused a ruckus during class which leads to Thoth leaving the class.

episodes.title: The Curse of Hades
episodes.plot: The episode starts with Yui asking all the students what club they would like to join for the school year.

episodes.title: The Unforgivable Heart
episodes.plot: Class is finally over, and it's time for the club activities to start. Takeru, however, has yet to join a club and Thoth tells Yui to solve the problem and to make the "failure" (Takeru) join a club. Later in the day, Yui notices Takeru practicing swordplay with a stick and asks him about it.

episodes.title: The Moonlight's Feelings
episodes.plot: Yui comes to school in early morning, but she finds a crowd of students are waiting outside the gates.

episodes.title: Dark Prison of Scattered Flowers
episodes.plot: 6 months have past. Thoth said that they are going to have mid-term exam within 3 days shocking Yui.

episodes.title: Lovely and Ephemeral
episodes.plot: The Gods and Yui perform a version of Cinderella, which thanks to Loki and Anubis, was turned to a play nothing like Cinderella.

episodes.title: Chains of Fate
episodes.plot: A continuation of episode 10 where the episode finished with Balder collapsing after the play.

episodes.title: Eternal Separation
episodes.plot: Continuation of episode 11, Balder does not die but he changes to the God of Destruction.
